skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Heal the ally with the lowest HP by 5% of their MAX HP. 

Cannot heal this Champion.
skills.name: Blade of Blessings

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Heals all allies by 15% of their MAX HP, then decreases the duration of all buffs on all enemies by 1 turn and increases the duration of all buffs on all allies by 1 turn.
skills.name: Quest For Meaning
skills.books:
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Heal +5%
Level 5: Heal +5%

skills.desc: Revives a dead ally with 50% HP, then fills their Turn Meter by 50% and resets the cooldowns on all their skills.
skills.name: Rise of Glory

Level 2: Cooldown -1
Level 3: Cooldown -1
Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
[Passive Effect]

Increases the amount of healing allies receive by 10%.

[Active Effect]

If an ally is about to get killed by a fatal hit, preempts that hit and instantly places a [Revive On Death] buff on them for 1 turn before the damage is taken.
